Merge pull request #60 from Kreozot/patch-1

jquery peerDep changes to 1.x version minimum

jquery peerDep changes to 1.x version minimum

It prevents errors with npm install when using jquery 1.x version in project.

Fixed anchors cache

Fixed anchors cache for compatibility with Turbolinks.
"Anchor" element must not be used if it occasionally is out of DOM.

Bump to 0.4.1, see description

* IE9 fix
* code cleanup
* publish to npm (closes #31)
* jquery is now a peerDep (closes #53)
* improve positioning documentation
* dont reuse element notifications, always recreate (closes #43)

Merge pull request #50 from herong/master

Compatible  ie9 and below

minor changes

	* jshintrc: let's stick to defaults.
	* updated package.json to reflect suggestions on plugins.jquery.com
remove ugly coffeescript variable hoisting, fix indexOf polyfill
readded UMD stuff, and package.json tests
bump to 0.3.4, single dist file `notify.js`, move docs out to notify-com repo, cleaned up generated coffeescript, minification is now done in the browser on the docs page
revert deletion of combined distributions until build is fixed
update docs to point to new repo, put a 10sec auto-hide on @jpillora's book ad, remove unused docs/index, package.json spaces->tabs

repackaged without coffeescript, or grunt stuff

upgraded docs, fixed cursor show when clickToHide:false, bumped to 0.3.2
fixed className shortcut on element notification - closes #11
merged docs repo into main repo
